definitions.definition: A person or object meant to lure somebody into danger .
A real or fake animal used by hunters to lure game .
Deceptive military device used to draw enemy attention or fire away from a more important target.
An assembly of hooped or netted corridors into which wild ducks may be enticed (originally by tame ducks) and trapped.

main_definition: A person or object meant to lure somebody into danger .
secondary_definitions: A real or fake animal used by hunters to lure game .
Deceptive military device used to draw enemy attention or fire away from a more important target.
An assembly of hooped or netted corridors into which wild ducks may be enticed (originally by tame ducks) and trapped.
